name: Soul Purge
description:
We are a team composed by two members, Alex Barra and Arnau Ramos. We are students at UB-ENTI in Cross-platform Application Development focused on videogames. This has been the largest project of the first year of the course, we have worked hard to bring you this game. We have learned Unity from zero and this is the ultimate project of our schollar journey.
